title: Why dont people believe me when I say Ryze is hard? :'(
body: It makes me sad cos hes actually really high skillcap now cos nerfs.

replies.body: What the hell have you been smoking? Ryze is NOT high skillcap, never was and never will be, he has always been a low skillcap champion.

I would say it is largely due to the fact that his kit, similar to Katarina has many opportunities where frantically mashing all your buttons can actually do things and win you fights, even though both Ryze and Katarina have to make thought out decisions later in the game, this mentality generally makes people dislike the champs outright. Also Ryze top is utter hell for about 95% of top lane champs, thus he's not hard to play against a lot of them.
